targets.query: SELECT "infraWiNode_attributes_health" FROM "ACI_APIC" WHERE ("apic" = 'sandboxapicdc.cisco.com') AND time > now() - 3m limit 1

SELECT "infraWiNode_attributes_apicMode" AS "Mode", "infraWiNode_attributes_health" AS "Health", "infraWiNode_attributes_failoverStatus" AS "FailoverStatus", "infraWiNode_attributes_adminSt" AS "AdminStatus", "infraWiNode_attributes_operSt" AS "OperStatus" FROM "ACI_APIC" WHERE time = now() -10m
SELECT last("fvTenant_children_0_healthInst_attributes_cur") AS "Health" FROM "ACI_TenantHealth" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "fvTenant_attributes_name"
SELECT count(*) FROM(SELECT last("fvTenant_children_0_healthInst_attributes_cur") AS "Health" FROM "ACI_TenantHealth" WHERE time > now() - 3m GROUP BY "fvTenant_attributes_name")

SELECT last("topSystem_attributes_state") AS "state", "topSystem_attributes_systemUpTime" AS "UpTime", "topSystem_children_0_healthInst_attributes_cur" AS "Health" FROM "ACI_NodeHealth" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "topSystem_attributes_name", "topSystem_attributes_oobMgmtAddr", "topSystem_attributes_podId", "topSystem_attributes_role"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM ACI_APIC WITH KEY=apic
list.label: APIC Cluster
list.name: APICCluster
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM ACI_APIC WITH KEY=apic
